moves.name: Flash
moves.description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Moonlight
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Tail Glow
moves.description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Signal Beam
moves.description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.
